channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADC, FortiProxy, FortiMail, FortiOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADC, FortiProxy, FortiMail, FortiOS

item.title: CVE-2022-22299|2024-08-03T03:07:50.220Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiadc%2C%20fortiproxy%2C%20fortimail%2C%20fortios
item.description: A format string vulnerability [CWE-134] in the command line interpreter of FortiADC version 6.0.0 through 6.0.4, FortiADC version 6.1.0 through 6.1.5, FortiADC version 6.2.0 through 6.2.1, FortiProxy version 1.0.0 through 1.0.7, FortiProxy version 1.1.0 through 1.1.6, FortiProxy version 1.2.0 through 1.2.13, FortiProxy version 2.0.0 through 2.0.7, FortiProxy version 7.0.0 through 7.0.1, FortiOS version 6.0.0 through 6.0.14, FortiOS version 6.2.0 through 6.2.10, FortiOS version 6.4.0 through 6.4.8, FortiOS version 7.0.0 through 7.0.2, FortiMail version 6.4.0 through 6.4.5, FortiMail version 7.0.0 through 7.0.2 may allow an authenticated user to execute unauthorized code or commands via specially crafted command arguments.
